events.message: I received my order yesterday and the laptop screen has a large scratch that wasn't mentioned anywhere.
The system has categorized the customer issue as Product Defect based on keywords like scratch and damage.
An agent has been assigned to handle the defect claim regarding the damaged laptop screen.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. Let's work on resolving this.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratched screen along with the order number so I can verify and process your claim?
I've attached the photo showing the scratch. My order number is 123456789. This is very disappointing for a new product.
Thank you for the photo and order details. We can offer you either a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I prefer to get a replacement laptop, as I still want to use the product but in perfect condition.
We have processed your request for a replacement and shipped the new laptop. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that the replacement laptop has arrived and that you are satisfied with the condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday, and everything is perfect now. Thank you for the prompt help!
Closing this case as resolved with the customer's satisfaction confirmed for the replacement laptop.
